description: A special module for certain LDC weapons.  It's a small, curved, soft-looking piece of a metallic material which is warm to the touch.  Seems that mere contact in specific sites of the weapon will dock it.  This module changes the property of the ammo to work on a similar way like pellets, at the cost of slightly reducing the damage done.
